title: Inactivity notification
body: I'm currently Diamond 5, 3 days ago when I logged in i received a notification that said I would decay and lose LP if I dont play ranked in the next 8 days. I immediately played a ranked game. Yesterday I logged in and i got a notification that I'll decay in 6 days. So I played a ranked game. TODAY I log in, I have again a notification that I'll decay in 5 days. What is going on?

replies.body: So what happend? did you lose LP in soloq?

I've got your account pulled up, and it looks like you've actually placed in Diamond for Ranked Solo **and** Ranked Flex Twisted Treeline. Since you keep playing games and you're still seeing the inactivity message, I'm going to assume that it's alerting you to the other ranked queue that you haven't been playing in.
